name: Extendable Baton
info: A handy dandy extendable baton. This deals 2 damage and doesn't require proficiency to use without LOSING LEVERAGE.

name: Knife
info: Deals 2 damage + DEXTROUS (1 damage on SNAG) and doesn't require proficiency to use without LOSING LEVERAGE.

name: Brass Knuckles
info: Adds +1 to what would otherwise be unarmed damage.

name: Crystal Charge x 5
info: Ammo used in a magical ranged weapon. Each shot fired consumes 1 AMMO on a SNAG or FAILURE.

name: Tazer
info: Can be used to try to stun someone. Make a melee attack roll against an afflictable target. On a SUCCESS, the target is stunned. The next roll against them HAS LEVERAGE. (1 damage on SNAG).
Requires magical ammo.

name: Nunchucks
info: A great weapon for a skilled martial artist. Tricky to use though. Deals MARTIAL + DEXTROUS damage on SUCCESS. Deals 1d4 damage on SNAG.

name: Staff
info: A quality staff can be used well by a skilled martial artist. Deals 2 + MARTIAL damage. (Deals 2 Damage on SNAG)

name: Silver Knuckles
info: Adds +2 to what would otherwise be unarmed damage.

name: Sword
info: A standard sword deals 2 damage + MARTIAL or BODY. (2 damage on SNAG)

name: Crystal Pistol
info: A magic powered gun that can deals 1d8 damage (3 on SNAG). Requires proficiency to use without LOSING LEVERAGE.
Requires magical ammo.

name: Auto-Magic Rifle
info: Deals 1d8 damage on SUCCESS (3 on SNAG).
Requires magical ammo.

name: Longsword
info: Deal 3 damage (1d4 on SNAG). Add BODY on SUCCESS.

name: Crystal Rifle
info: A magic powered rifle that can shoot targets over far distances. Deals 1d10 damage (4 on SNAG). Add BODY to damage when target is further than THROWN, range.
Requires magical ammo.

name: Scythe
info: Deals 4d4 damage. Add BODY ATTRIBUTE to damage on SUCCESS.

name: Crystal Sword
info: A clear crystalline hilt with no blade until magic is funneled into the weapon when holding it and your MAGIC attribute is more then 0. You can also funnel magic into it with the effects of the Imbue spell.

Magic can be funneled at will or imbued. When this is done, a thin neon beam of mana in a color of your choosing extends from your blade. The thickness can vary but the length stays the same and matches the length of a standard sword.
Deals damage equal to your MAGIC ATTRIBUTE. The damage is doubled on SUCCESS (and quadrupled on CRIT).
